commenter_a: Imagine a Trump led America With a vision to make us great, Builder, businessman, father, With a leader, fighter trait. Imagine a really, really big wall, With a big, beautiful door, Swings one way to put out the bad, The other to let in the good. Imagine a man of integrity, A man the world will respect, A man who will fill the office With all the honor we expect. Imagine a Trump led America With a vision to make us Great, Imagine a Trump led America ...
